Dialogue.Page: Huh... So you were here before huh, 'Spar?
I gotta radio Hornfels about this later, I guess.. Maybe we might at least be able to find out what happened to you, if we can track down where you were headed.
Nice of you to leave a campfire and some fuel here for me. Saves me having to make a new campfire to score this island on the ol' Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
Ah, that's the stuff.. Toasty marshmallows and a warm fire on this cold planet.. <Pause> *Yawn*
Woah.. Woah. Where am I? What's happening? I'm in space!
Stars above... A cyclone must have picked up the island while I was asleep!
Lucky that cyclone woke me up when it did, or that could've been real bad!
Guess nobody can sleep through a cyclone. Those Hearthian instincts are good.
Or maybe Feldspar woke me up before I joined them..? <Pause> ..Heh.
Thanks for looking out for me, 'Spar. See you in the stars someday.
Solid 5 out of 10 for this island's vibes. Onto the next island.
